DOC.brief_title: Colorectal Cancer Screening Community Health Setting
DOC.detailed_description: This single-center RCT Family Practice & Counseling Network ( FPCN ) , community clinic Southwest Philadelphia 320 eligible subject age 50-74 randomize two study arm : 1. text messaging outreach ( text ) 2. text message outreach lottery 1/5 chance win financial incentive ( text + lottery ) . Findings provide data feasibility mail FIT approach community health setting , patient respond text message behavioral economic engagement incentive .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Between 50 74 year old 2 . Has active medical insurance 3 . Has least one visit Health Annex prior 12 month ( time chart review ) 4 . Due CRC screening ( colonoscopy last 10 year , sigmoidoscopy last 5 year , stool test last 1 year ) 5 . Asymptomatic CRC 1 . Has prior colonoscopy within 10 year , sigmoidoscopy within 5 year , FOBT/FIT within twelve month chart review ( exclude patient selfreport undergoing procedure ) 2 . Has history CRC 3 . Has history GI cancer 4 . Has history confirm Inflammatory Bowel Disease ( IBD ) ( e.g . Crohns disease , ulcerative colitis ) 5 . Has history colon polyps 6 . Has colectomy 7 . Has firstdegree relative diagnose CRC 8 . Has diagnose Lynch Syndrome ( i.e . HNPCC ) 9 . Has diagnose Familial Adenomatous Polyposis ( FAP ) . 10 . Has iron deficiency anemia 11 . Has recent history lower GI bleed 12 . Has metastatic ( Stage IV ) blood solid tumor cancer 13 . Has end stage renal disease 14 . Has congestive heart failure 15 . Has dementia 16 .
